synopsis.text:
Ryu and the Race Against Aliens: A New Chapter in Duel Masters Victory!

Embark on a thrilling journey with Katta Kirifuda, the younger sibling of the legendary duelist Shobu, in the seventh season of the Duel Masters anime series, Duel Masters Victory. Inspired by his brother's success, Katta aspires to become a dueling champion but seeks to carve his own path to greatness.

Join Katta and his friends – Bucyake, Yohdel, and Benchan – as they set out on their dueling adventures, facing formidable opponents and growing stronger together. Among these adversaries, Dragon Ryu emerges as Katta's most formidable rival, pushing him to new heights in the world of competitive dueling.

But there's more to this season than just dueling! Witness the unfolding story behind the epic battle between the Hunters and Aliens, adding a new layer of intrigue to the Duel Masters universe. Get ready for a fresh, action-packed adventure that will leave you eager for more!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
